price: ߊ߲ ߓߊ߲߫ ߘߊ߫ ߞߊ߬ ߓߐ߲ߛߐ߲ߘߊ߫ ߜߘߍ߫ ߟߎ߫ ߟߊߓߐ߫ ߏ߬ ߟߎ߬ ߞߐ߫
arabic: ثُمَّ أَنشَأۡنَا مِنۢ بَعۡدِهِمۡ قَرۡنًا ءَاخَرِينَ

version.title: N'ko translation - Baba Mamadi
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the N'ko language, translated by Karamo / Baba Mamadi Jani.

meta.transliteration: thumma anshanā min baʿdihim qarnan ākharīna
